Prep Time: 15 Minutes
Cook Time: 5 Minutes
Ready In: 30 Minutes
Yield: 12 Servings

Ingredients:
6 roma tomatoes, diced
1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil
3 cloves minced garlic
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
1/4 cup fresh basil, stems removed
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 French baguette
2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven on the broiler setting.

2. In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, vinegar, basil,
salt, and pepper. Allow mixture to sit for 10 minutes.

3. Cut the baguette into 3/4 –inch slices. On a baking sheet, arrange the baguette
slices in a single layer and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.

4. Broil for 5 minutes.

5. Divide the tomato mixture evenly over baguette slices. Serve.
